item.title: Concepts: Origin
item.description:
The origin component is a part of a secret for Vela.

This declaration allows you to pull secrets from non-internal secret providers via plugins.

To see what plugins are supported and how they integrate with the Vela build lifecycle see the plugins page

Syntax

The following is an example of valid syntax for the component:

version: "1"

metadata:
  template: false

secrets:
  - name: vault_token
    key: go-vela/vault_token
    engine: native
    type: org

+  - origin:
+     name: vault external secrets
+     image: target/secret-vault
+     secrets: [ vault_token ]
+     parameters:
+       addr: vault.company.com
+       auth_method: token
+       username: octocat
+       items:
+         - source: secret/vela
+           path: user

steps:
  - name: test
    image: golang
    secrets: [ username, password ]
    commands:
      - cat /vela/secrets/user/name
      - cat /vela/secrets/user/password
To see more information on the Vault plugin usage see the Vault docs
